Operating System 2021 Machine Problem Site

The site provides the information for machine problems for Operating System Course offerred in Spring 2021 at National Taiwan University

Announcements

  • If you need enrollment, please submit the 加簽表單(close).
  • Please fill GitHub account survey. Make sure you have already enrolled in this course.

Machine Problems

MP4 - File Systems 06/01 06/15 09:00 周良冠
Logistics - - 劉愷為

Should you have any question, please go to NTU COOL and post it in corresponding forum.

You are encouraged to answer questions. If we adjust score after the semester ends, we will first consider those who:

  1. Answer other’s question
  2. Figure out the bug in MPs

Rules

  • Only C is available.
  • There is NO tolerance for plagiarism.
